title: Corporate Screenings
subtitle: Employee wellness programs and corporate training sessions

hero.title: Corporate Screenings
hero.description: Bring awareness of maternal health challenges to your corporate environment through professional screenings of "24 Days Without You". Our corporate package is designed to enhance employee wellness programs, diversity and inclusion initiatives, and workplace empathy training.

steps.title: Corporate Consultation
steps.description: Discuss your company's wellness goals, employee demographics, and how the screening can support your corporate initiatives.

steps.title: Program Customization
steps.description: Tailor the screening experience to align with your corporate values, wellness programs, and employee engagement objectives.

steps.title: Employee Screening & Discussion
steps.description: Host the screening with facilitated discussions about healthcare awareness, family support, and workplace wellness.

highlight.title: Morgan Stanley Event
highlight.description: 24 Days Without You was hosted by one of Morgan Stanley's women's wellness groups in honor of Maternal Mental Health Awareness Day. They rented a theater and provided snacks and beverages. Conversation with Annie and Rebecca followed the film.
